segments.text: I hear you bought a new house in the northern suburbs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right , we bought it the same day we came on the market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of house is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s a wonderful Spanish style .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I love the roof tiles on Spanish style houses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And it ’ s a bargaining . A house like this in river side costs double the price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great , is it a two bedroom house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it has three bedrooms and three beds , and has a living room with a twelve-foot ceiling . There ’ s a two-car garage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s a nice area too . It ’ ll be a good investment for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeas , when will you buy a house ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not untill the end of this year , you know , just before my wedding .
segments.speaker: S1
